timeline.message:
remove deprecated RPS dispose() method
that froze UI on connection deletion/port change
remove unused RPS properties keys
add jmrix config pane null checks
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/JMRI/JMRI into eb-rps

timeline.bodyText:
@silverailscolo Thanks for all the cleanup!
From the comment, this is intended to remove either CR or LF, so the && should probably have been a ||
timeline.author: bobjacobsen

replies.bodyText: My IDE told me one of these would never be true, not 10 && not 13 seems fine if it would have been.
replies.author: silverailscolo

replies.bodyText: Aha!  Earlier, the code had already handled 13.  Thanks!
replies.author: bobjacobsen
